description.p: The name of a placeholder, or id of an HTML element where the progress bar is shown. If an id of an element, prefix the id with element e.g. *[js:element:div1]*.
The percentage complete. Specify a value of 0 to display an empty progress bar and 100 to display a full progress bar.

discussion.p: The *[js:progressBarSetProgress()]* method updates the progress indicator. The *[js:pct]* argument defines how much of the progress bar should be filled.
You must first call [{dialog.object}.progressBarShow()] to create and display the progress bar.
